Reference

Main Model Fitting Function

bamlss()

Fit Bayesian Additive Models for Location Scale and Shape (and Beyond)

Optimizers

Optimizer functions that can be used for model fitting using bamlss()

opt_bfit() bfit() bfit_iwls() bfit_iwls_Matrix() bfit_lm() bfit_optim() bfit_glmnet()

Fit BAMLSS with Backfitting

opt_boost() boost() opt_boostm() boostm() boost_summary() boost_plot() print(<boost_summary>) plot(<boost_summary>) boost_frame()

Boosting BAMLSS

opt_bbfit() bbfit() opt_bbfitp() contribplot()

Batchwise Backfitting

opt_Cox() cox_mode()

Cox Model Posterior Mode Estimation

jm_bamlss() jm_transform() opt_JM() jm_mode() sam_JM() jm_mcmc() jm_predict() jm_survplot()

Fit Flexible Additive Joint Models

stabsel() plot(<stabsel>)

Stability selection.

bboost() bboost_plot() predict(<bboost>)

Bootstrap Boosting

bayesx2() boost2() lasso2()

Some Shortcuts

Samplers

Sampler functions that can be used for model fitting using bamlss()

sam_BayesX() BayesX() BayesX.control() sx() tx() tx2() tx3() tx4() smooth.construct(<tensorX.smooth.spec>) Predict.matrix(<tensorX.smooth>) smooth.construct(<tensorX3.smooth.spec>) Predict.matrix(<tensorX3.smooth>) quant_bamlss() get_BayesXsrc()

Markov Chain Monte Carlo for BAMLSS using BayesX

sam_JAGS() JAGS() BUGSeta() BUGSmodel()

Markov Chain Monte Carlo for BAMLSS using JAGS

sam_MVNORM() MVNORM()

Create Samples for BAMLSS by Multivariate Normal Approximation

sam_Cox() cox_mcmc()

Cox Model Markov Chain Monte Carlo

sam_GMCMC() GMCMC() GMCMC_iwls() GMCMC_iwlsC() GMCMC_iwlsC_gp() GMCMC_slice()

General Markov Chain Monte Carlo for BAMLSS

jm_bamlss() jm_transform() opt_JM() jm_mode() sam_JM() jm_mcmc() jm_predict() jm_survplot()
